texts.name: Kevin
texts.text: I did text! Allie answered me, said she'd be ready when I arrived.

texts.name: Kevin
texts.text: But she wasn't there. You guys know I charge when you're not there.

texts.name: Kevin
texts.text: I guess your neighbors heard, because some lady came in - Gertrude?

texts.name: Kevin
texts.text: I don't know. Now we have a whole commotion here.
texts.thought: Weird Allie wasn't here. I hope nothing happened to her, I can't do a lawsuit.

choices.wrongAnswer: I don't know. I almost had to escort her out. Such a hassle.

choices.text: Why are Mabel and Merlin down here?
choices.wrongAnswer: I told you, they heard the commotion.

choices.text: Do you think something happened to her?
